name: OWLR Technologies Ltd.
description: Developer of a universal smart home platform designed to make complex home security cameras safer and easier to use. The company's platform provides a free mobile application used for home security and network cameras, enabling users to monitor and control their homes anywhere.
one_liner: Developer of a universal smart home platform designed to make complex home security cameras safer and easier to use. The company's platform provides a free mobile application used for home security and network cameras, enabling users to monitor and control their homes anywhere.
